name: The Adventures Of Porta
description:
Story: 

In a fantasy based world, you play as the party member’s humble merchant named Porta collecting drop items. 

Your friends fell apart ever since that “incident” and your party members decided to take a break but never came back. Find out what happened during that “incident” and bring your party members all back together. 

Objectives: 

Listen to each dialogues carefully, identify which issues for each character to help you find the people you need to talk to solve it. (Lost/Abandoned/Heartbreak/Hatred)

Instruction: 

  1. Type: [ "open all" ] - This will open the inventory and your next quest.
  2. Type: [ "close all" ] - This will close the inventory and your next quest.
  3. Type: [ "open inventory" ] - This will only open the inventory.
  4. Type: [ "close inventory" ] - This will only close the inventory.
  5. Type: [ "open quest" ] - This will only open the quest of your next progression.
  6. Type: [ "close quest" ] - This will only close the quest of your next progression.
  7. Type: [ "map" ] - This will take you to the map.
  8. Type: [ "<alf/klein/jake/helen>" ] - This will take you to one of the 4 party members in the game.
  9. Giving inventory items: Items will automatically disappears in your inventory and given one of the 4 party members when you try and struck a conversation with them by typing "talk to [name]".
  10. Type: [ "item + item" ] - There will be a written note that contains the combination of specific items to get the key items to move on with the story. Jake will tell you how to open the "written note'" after you solved his 3 riddles.
